DOC.brief_summary: This study do obtain pathology report patient Dent disease registry kidney biopsy . The investigator collect biopsy slide report attempt determine common finding .
DOC.brief_title: Review Kidney Biopsies Dent Disease Patients
DOC.detailed_description: If patient agrees study , patient ask participate following : - Sign consent form indicate patient 's willingness participate . - Provide sign medical release form allow investigator request official kidney biopsy report , also allow investigator request original slide review . At end study , slide return refer facility . - The investigator also review medical record
DOC.criteria: All patient Dent Disease Registry previous renal biopsy .
